name: indulgence
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] an occasion when you allow someone or yourself to have something enjoyable, especially more than is good for you: Chocolate is my only indulgence. All the pleasures and indulgences of the weekend are over, and I must get down to some serious hard work.over-indulgence in His health suffered from over-indulgence in (= too much) rich food and drink. See also
self-indulgence
[ U ] an occasion when you allow or do not mind someone's failure or bad behaviour: My inability to do needlework was treated with surprising indulgence by my teacher.
